name: Colláis
description: The Colláis is a large monstrosity that embodies a fierce and imposing presence, with formidable melee attacks and magical resilience.
memorable: Its ability to throw enemies away with Impale and Toss can disrupt enemy formations and strategies.
goals: Dominate foes and control the battlefield.
relations: May be encountered with other forest creatures, especially beasts.
strengths: Impressive melee combat capabilities and magical resistance.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack that includes a powerful gore attack and two devastating hooves attacks.
most_powerful_ability: The Cry of the Forest frightens nearby creatures, negatively impacting their combat effectiveness.
senses: Blindsight up to 120 feet and a notably high passive perception of 17 makes it very aware of its surroundings.
skills: Very high intimidation and perception skills, making it a terrifying presence both in and out of combat.
additional_information: Immune to being charmed or frightened.
Magic Resistance allows it to roll twice against spells.
Can reposition targets dramatically during combat with Impale and Toss.
Creates chaos in enemy ranks with its psychological Cry of the Forest.
Has exceptional strength for melee combat with a Strength score of 19.
test_queries: large monstrosity that frightens other creatures
forest creature with powerful melee attacks
creature that can toss enemies away
imposing being that dominates the battlefield
